content.text:
# Krais of the Russian Empire

The Russian Empire at various times included the subdivisions known as krais, either formally or informally. Some of these krais were:
*Caucasus Krai
*Turkestan Krai
*Privislinsky Krai
*Uriankhaisky Krai
*Western Krai
**Northwestern Krai
**Southwestern Krai
See also
*Krais of Russia
